content:
That's fantastic! It's amazing how much progress you've made in just 3 months! Sharing your personal experience and enthusiasm with Emily can be a powerful motivator. Your excitement and confidence in your own improvement can be contagious and might just inspire her to join you on this salsa adventure!

By sharing your story, you can also highlight the benefits of taking salsa classes, such as:

* Improved coordination and balance
* Increased confidence on the dance floor
* Meeting new people and making friends who share similar interests
* Getting a great workout while having fun
* Learning a new skill and challenging yourself

Emphasize how much fun you're having and how much you've learned, and Emily might be more likely to join you on this journey. Who knows, you might just inspire her to discover a new passion!

Remember to also mention the festival's beginner-friendly atmosphere and the variety of workshops and sessions available. This can help alleviate any concerns she might have about not knowing enough salsa or feeling intimidated.

Good luck, and I hope Emily decides to join you on this salsa adventure!
